author: Madison Hoff
title: Here's how to fill out the 2020 Census if you've temporarily moved because of the coronavirus and have no idea what you should list as your home
description: Census Day was April 1, which represents the date used to report where you live and who you live with on the census questionnaire. Some Americans have left their typical residence during the novel coronavirus pandemic. The Census Bureau said in a press releas…
content: The decennial census is underway, counting everyone living in the United States right now. Americans should fill out their Census forms because the count is used to determine congressional representation and important funding for the next decade. But just lik… [+2918 chars]
